author: remm
msg: - The response facade now have its own committed flag, so that the application
layer can be committed (during a sendRedirect or sendError) while not committing

author: remm
msg: - Add new recycle facade method, which is used by the core to recycle

msg: - Create the Jasper loader in delegating mode (may prevent trouble).
